entry.title: Five minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: Ackorna

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,883Chapters: 25/?Kudos: 62

Summary: After years of dancing around their feelings, Buck and Eddie finally get trapped together in an elevator — and the moment they’ve been avoiding ignites into something real. What starts as heat and teasing quickly grows into something much deeper as they navigate their feelings, the teasing from the 118, and introducing this new dynamic to Christopher.From late-night conversations and nervous confessions to first arguments and quiet makeups, Buck slowly goes from being a guest in Eddie’s house to truly belonging there. With Maddie’s blunt sisterly humor, Carla’s gentle nudges, Christopher’s blunt honesty, and the team’s endless ribbing, the Diaz-Buckley household becomes a place full of warmth, laughter, and family.This is a slow build that becomes a love story — about choosing each other, about making a home, and about finally realizing that Buck isn’t just part of Eddie and Christopher’s life. He is their life.

entry.title: you could be my baby, baby, baby
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,109Chapters: 5/9Kudos: 481

Summary: “My mom said, uh, that his name was Buck. That he was going to go to the fire academy and that he had a—” she broke off, rubbing her own forehead, exactly where his skin went pink. “She said he went by Firehose.” Buck didn’t need all of his coworkers to look at him in alarm; he was pretty sure he’d gone deadly pale. His daughter knew four things about him, and one of them was his old tinder profile handle. He felt a little like he was going to die. “She’s got your eyes,” Eddie commented, unhelpfully. ---- Buck finds out he has a daughter, and also a stupidly big crush on his best friend. It's an adjustment.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 132,250Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,862Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 14

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: A Big Bold Beautiful Journey
entry.summary:
Author: CartepostaleX

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,741Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 0

Summary: “First instruction: Pick up Evan Buckley.” Eddie froze. His gaze flicked to the rearview mirror, where Buck’s car was parked two spaces over. Buck was in the driver’s seat, his silhouette visible under the lot’s string lights. The hood of his car was up.Eddie muttered, “No. No, no, no. That’s not-”As if sensing his resistance, the GPS chimed again. “Instruction: Pick up Evan Buckley. Distance: fifty feet.” Eddie rubbed his temple. This was insane.   aka-When Eddie and Buck meet at a wedding, they’re thrown into an adventure guided by a magical (cursed)GPS and doors that lead them through pivotal moments from their pasts. As they relive forgotten memories and face unspoken truths, they discover that the journey isn’t just about the past...it’s about rewriting the future.

entry.title: Water, On the Rocks
entry.summary:
Author: eutony_majime

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,501Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 49

Summary: It was Buck’s turn to chuckle. The bartender placed his glass of ice water in front of him. A deep, refreshing gulp made him realize just how dry his throat was. “So,” Eddie said, setting his beer down. “What's your name, Mr. Designated Driver?”Buck hesitated. “My name? Evan Buckley. Everybody calls me Buck.”“A pleasure, Buck. Name's Eddie,” he said, that smile of his growing on his face once more. “I hope I'm a part of the ‘Everybody’ that can call you Buck?”“Yeah,” Buck said, reaching for his water to cool his pounding heart. “Yeah, you are.”OrBuck was just broken up with. All he wanted to do was move in with his significant other; what could have possibly been so wrong about that? Maddie and Chimney take Buck to a line dance bar to take his mind off the breakup, where he meets Eddie, a line dance teacher.

entry.title: Happier Than Ever
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,596Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 149

Summary: "It’s Dr. Wells. The Dr. Wells Bobby had sent Buck to, over a year and a half ago. The same one he couldn’t quite admit had taken advantage of him, had made him feel numb whenever he tried sharing his feelings, who made it impossible to open up to any other therapist— She was there and she had a baby. A baby who couldn’t be more than ten months old. A baby with his blonde hair and bright blue eyes, not her dark hair and dark eyes." or Dr. Wells had a baby & never told Buck. - title from the song by billie eilish pls heed the tags, & i'll be putting warnings at the beginning of each chapter, this is going to be a relatively heavy fic (tho it will be focused on recovery) so pls prioritize your own mental health.

entry.title: Tragedeigh
entry.summary:
Author: guiltyaschanged

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,125Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: “Okay, hear me out,” Buck says. He makes a big gesture with his hands, and Eddie braces himself for impact. “We call him—well, if he’s a him—we call him Buddie.”Eddie never thought he’d see the day. A normal name suggestion. He was about ready to give Buck a pat on the back, before Buck (love of his life; colossal idiot) kept going.“Because when you smash our names together, you get Buddie!”Buck and Eddie have a baby on the way, and they need to come up with a name. Buck's suggestions are... creative.

entry.title: Even the Dead Still Breathe
entry.summary:
Author: BlckOnyx

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 97,941Chapters: 25/26Kudos: 113

Summary: It has been a year since Bobby’s death, and Buck has never been the same. Grief eats at him in quiet ways the rest of the 118 can’t quite reach, so when he announces he’s taking a break and heading abroad, everyone tells themselves he deserves the space. A week later, he disappears. Weeks turn into months, and the people he left behind are forced to believe the unthinkable—that Buck walked away for good. Until the headlines change, and the word “presumed dead” settles over them like ash. What none of them know is that Buck’s story didn’t end there. His grief, his secrets, and the dangerous truth he’s been carrying all lead back to a past no one at the 118 ever imagined. And when the pieces finally surface, the loss they thought they understood becomes something else entirely. How will the 118 deal with losing people they love, only to find out later that it was all a lie? OR Buck disappeared, and the truth might destroy what’s left of the family they built.
